title: ANNOUNCING THE 2016 ONE BOOK, ONE PHILADELPHIA SELECTION: COLD MOUNTAIN BY CHARLES FRAZIER (Free Library ...
text: ( Source : Free Library of Philadelphia ) In its 14th year, One Book examines our nation's past and the power of perseverance PHILADELPHIA , October 1, 2015-The Free Library of Philadelphia and the Mayor 's Office today announced the selection
